attributes.action: Give retired persons, in receipt of State pensions aged between 60 and 65 a higher tax allowance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the removal of the 10 pence tax band the same higher tax allowance, given to 65 year olds, should be given to retired persons aged 60 to 65, when they are in receipt of a state pension.
